products.description: Their sahara pvc blackout range is available in two classic and neutral tones that are ideal for wet or heat based environments. products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Sahara Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Verdi (blackout) sahara sand takes its inspiration from the endless expanse of desert that allows your mind to wander. The calming colour is perfect for setting your mind at ease, whilst the authenticity of the curves means you can add that regal touch you've been searching for. Pairing sahara sand with a variety of patterned wall papers and rugs is a great way to breathe new life into the living room.

products.title: Doyenne Sahara Roller Blind
products.description: Colourful, bold and sure to make an impact. This doyenne sahara roller blind will bring a taste of the tropics into your home, as well as a heap of designer flair. It is part of their harlequin additions collection after all. The silhouetted flower stems and leaves overlap, creat colourful, bold and sure to make an impact.

products.title: Quadro Sahara Roller Blind
products.description: Unique, modern and vibrant, theres a lot to love about the quadro sahara roller blind from the harlequin additions collection. Bringing some designer style to your home, itll make a wonderful centrepiece with its charming pattern and bold colourway. To really make it stand unique, modern and vibrant, theres a lot to love about the quadro sahara roller blind from the harlequin additions collection.
